name: ActorMichaelMerchant
text: I've been here way too many times! Literally everyday for about 2 months because it's easy and convenient to order online and drop by and pick up the pizza.  Fast turn around! Staff is always very nice! Pizza is always cooked perfectly. The ‚Ä¶More

name: Brittany Will
text: We love MOD Pizza. You create your own pizza! You can also create your own salad. Pizza is great! To be honest, the salads are so good too. They will even toss it for you in the dressing of your choice. I recommend this MOD Pizza. They also have outdoor seating that is nice.

name: Brian Potvin
text: This was my first time at any  Mod Pizza locations, and let me tell you, it was GREAT!  The dough was just the right combination of chewy and crispy.  I loved the selection of toppings to choose, and the sauce was great.  The service was ‚Ä¶More

name: Tim Lawrence
text: Nice environment with attentive and friendly staff.  Great pizza with nice thin crust.  Best thing is make it your way and all topping,  no matter how many,  are included.

name: David Michael
text: I do enjoy mod pizza. It is not how ever a real pizza place as in home made to the core blow your socks off but it is how ever very good for a make your own pizza place. I do recommend if you have never been. Affordable and good

name: Harry Frasher
text: Great thin crust very tasty. Fresh ingredients bright back the basics but modernized it

name: James Stott
text: This is a great spot to take the whole family, especially if you have picky eaters. You get to pick your own toppings and completely customize your pizza or salad. If you don't want to go through all that you can pick one of the ‚Ä¶More

name: Anthony Orozco
text: The best make your own salad, and amazing pizzas you pretty much design your own. The cauliflower crust is also quite good.

name: Ashleigh Gardner
text: My son and I really loved the pizza. And your staff was amazing. Thank you so much!

name: Joe Markham
text: While build-your-own places are everywhere, the thin, crispy crust here is by far my favorite!  Supe fast and very tasty, too.

name: Judy Burnette
text: The food was fabulous. The thin crust pizza was crispy, and you have free refills w/ drinks. They have great selection of salad and pizza topping. Excellent prices

name: Aaron Scott
text: Went there yesterday for first time and the service was excellent. The food was prepared exactly to your liking. The store was very clean and when I got my pizza it was fantastic.

name: Vach Zest
text: Pretty good selection if pre-made pizzas, and of course the option to make your own is always nice. They make it right there in the oven they have. Didn't have to wait long at all once we ordered. 10/5 would go again in a heart beat.

name: Cheritta Crenshaw
text: Yum yum yum! So good to me.. Being able to create my own pizza is always a plus. A must try and taste location.

name: Donna Gray
text: Will not disappoint. Great crust and fresh topping selections with a hot ready final product. Tasty üòã

name: Jesse G.
text: Guy who!!!  This is great pizza. Made with what you want and how you want it. Fire baked and delicious. The staff is upbeat and friendly. The price... just under 10 bucks. Indoor and outdoor seating AND it took just over 5 min to make. Look at the pizza ü§©

name: Andrea Karelitz
text: Enjoy MOD when they actually listen to my order instructions. Last two times, the specifications were disregarded. Which is a shame because they have so much potential!

name: Jeffrey Rusnak
text: Great food.  Just wish inside seating and bathroom where available.

name: Susan Miller
text: Usually a good salad and pizza for me. This last time, due to mask, I mistakenly got a mega salad (in my opinion overpriced for size and quality) and about half of my arugula was wilted. I had already complained about the overpriced salad so I didn't say anything more.

name: Qdadon Williams
text: Never had any issues here everything I went the customer service was excellent and the food is always good as it is cook to order.

name: P Johnson
text: This 0lace is addictive for those who love pizza.  They have cauliflower and gluten free crusts.  Great crew members and the pizza is good!

name: Branden Randall

name: Kita Mitchell
text: This is pretty much the pizza version of subway. The crust is a bit on the thin side but good pizza.

name: Ricky Jones
text: I love the variety of toppings available for my pizza. The vegetables always look fresh and they keep the place clean. They even have dairy free cheese which is a big plus in my book. Great product!

name: Linda Hanson
text: What is nice about there pizza is you can put whatever on it and price is the same.

name: Rachel Ruby
text: Best thin crust pizza in town!

name: Kimberly Austin
text: 1st time there loved it will return with a smile.

name: Sirjay86 1
text: The pizza is good, and nice selection of toppings. For those who have not been it's set up almost like a subway. The good thing is you also get free dipping sauce including a pesto. Also the salads they make are also tasty.

name: Ace
text: Great service and suprisingly low prices! They're also pretty lax about customization: getting extra toppings doesn't cost extra. It's good pizza üëçüèæ

text: The service was great. The pizza not so great. Tasted like a frozen pizza to me because of the sub par  toppings. Needless to say I won't be back.

name: michael raines
text: Very fast easy and affordable. This was my 1st trip there. My wife and i really enjoyed it.  Maybe the next trip the dining area will be open

name: Emily Elizabeth
text: Friendly staff and great pizza, as always!

name: Ketra Honeycutt

name: Chuong Wynn
text: Thank for supporting Veterans.

name: Kaye Jae
text: Okay pizza, I found it to be bland. Poor customer service, they were young seemed inexperienced and acted as such. Only one young lady showed professionalism our entire visit. They have vegan cheese which is a plus. Will take the drive to Mellow Mushroom for vegan cheese next time.

name: Sayra Pantoja
text: Love coming to mod pizza. The pizza is delicious and their staff is nice and helpful. Have never had a bad experience with this place!

name: Troy Farley
text: Seriously bad pizza. I am usually a fairly generous reviewer, but honestly, this was the worst food I've ever had. The flavor was comparable to a 3 day old Cici's pizza reheated with a dumpster fire. Seriously, save yourself some money, go to the grocery store and pick out literally any frozen pizza.

text: Great Pizza! We were there for a fundraising event. Great staff and excellent food!

text: Excellent pizza! You only pay for the crust and then you can load it up with whatever you want! Delicious!

text: Excellent pizza spot. The pizza is delicious.  The staff members are wonderful and personable! They are going to see my face a lot!üòä

name: Casey C
text: The pizza was great, service was quick, and it was a good price.  The hot honey changed the way i eat pizza.  Also, those no name cakes are delicious!

name: Kevin Bolton
text: It's a great place to eat for the price! Put as much toppings as you want. It's like the Subway of pizza.

name: takema etheridge
text: Love MOD. This is a great concept to build your own pizza and not be charged extra for each topping.

name: C Byrd
text: Great quick and good lunch stop. Shared a pizza with hubby. Next time he'll have his own and I'll try their salads.

name: Lakesha Kirkendall

text: You direct the assembly of your pizza in the same fashion of Subway or Chipotle. Your pizza made your way. It's great! What more could you want...

name: Anthony Fields
text: The food was ok, service was good and fast. Brick oven style pizza, this reminds me of Blaze pizza in Williamsburg with a 3rd of the options. Not sure if its worth the price point at almost $10 a pizza with tax. Not top weekly lunch pic for me.

text: Ordered for delivery.  Arrived cold. Missing ingredients half the pizza had no ingredients on it.  Crust was chewy and hard

name: Kayla
